name: Avernum 3: Ruined World
description: Wander free through this epic, indie fantasy adventure. Explore a huge world that evolves as time passes. Towns fight battles. Refugees flee. Disasters happen. Features cunning adventures, great depth, and unlimited freedom. Be a merchant or bounty hunter, buy a home, save the world!
minimum_requirements: OS: Vista or Later Processor: 1.2 GHZ Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB VRAM Storage: 500 MB available space
